Home.quotaTitle: You're hitting the anonymous GitHub quota. Sign in or wait {seconds}s.
Home.anonTitle: You are analyzing without logging in.
Home.anonDesc: Some features may be limited (private repos disabled, 60 reqs/hr).
Home.quickStartSubtitle: No setup: paste the GitHub URL, run the analysis, read the report
Home.quickStep2Tip: Read-only via the GitHub API, no cloning required

tips.urlFormatTips: The repository can be public or private (if GitHub connection is active).
tips.readonlyTips: DebtCheck only reads the GitHub API : no clone, no changes.
tips.scopesTips: Minimal: repo:read. Private repos need the proper authorization.

Repos.sectionSubtitle: Select a repository to analyze its technical debt.
Repos.staleTitle: Cache potentially stale, refreshed data may be available.
Repos.staleDesc: The displayed data may have been served from the cache. Refresh to reload.

activity.title: Repository activity
activity.sinceUpdate: {count, plural, one {# day since last update} other {# days since last update}}
activity.sincePush: {count, plural, one {# day since last push}   other {# days since last push}}

help.main: Signals to detect inactivity or staleness in the repository.
help.updatedAt: Time since the default branch was updated (any ref update).
help.pushedAt: Time since the last commit was pushed.

issuesPrs.title: Issues & Pull Requests
issuesPrs.hintCloseIssues: Close resolved issues to keep the ratio healthy.
issuesPrs.hintReviewPrs: Review/merge or close stale PRs regularly.

help.openPct: Share of issues currently open vs total.
help.stalePrs: PRs with no activity for 30+ days.
help.stalePrs_30: Count of PRs with 30 days without activity.

help.main: Outdated/Deprecated packages can cause security and maintenance risks.
help.overall: Overall health derived from the worst dependency status.
help.deprecated: Marked as deprecated by the registry.

risks.title: Risks & hygiene
risks.noScanDesc: This report did not include Rust analysis results.
risks.secretsAdvice: Review and rotate keys if confirmed. Tests and placeholders can be ignored when safe rules apply.
risks.noSecretsDesc: Static scan did not find suspicious values.
risks.envDesc: Sensitive configuration files are committed in the repo.
risks.name: Name

help.main: Automatic findings from the files static analyzer.
help.secretsFound: Values that look like API keys/tokens in source files.
help.deadSummary: High-level counts computed from parse results.
help.envStat: Whether .env files exist in the repo.

modal.title: Create backlog in Jira
